name.description: [string]Name of damage dealer zone, used to trigger correct zone from code.

size.description: For a sphere, the size value sets the radius (the largest of X, Y and Z is used). For a box, the size represents the half-extents of the box along each axis. For a capsule, the radius of the cylinder and of the ending hemispheres is set by the larger of the X and Z dimensions, and the Y value gives the half-height of the cylinder.

offset.description: Positional offset from node position, y is forward in unit direction.

knockback_force_base.description: The knockback force given when dealing damage at min speed.

knockback_force_max.description: The knockback force given when dealing damage at max speed.

damage_angle.description: The z angle (from hit direction) the attack should be within to perform full damage, otherwise a graze attack is done instead.

mode.description: The zone imparted damage mode. Default is using impact damage using damage and imparted values in this zone's settings. Alternatively UnitSize can be used, where the Killable Unit Size Threshold setting is used.

graze_damage_multiplier.description: The damage multiplier used when the damage hit is grazing the target (hit angle is outside damage angle).

base_impact_damage_speed.description: The minimum speed required to impart impact damage

max_impact_damage_speed.description: The minimum speed required to impart maximum impact damage

base_imparted_impact_damage.description: Base impact damage instance we impart on others (given flat surface landing).

max_imparted_impact_damage.description: The maximum impact damage instancewe import on others  (given flat surface landing).

killable_threshold.description: Units of this size are killed and impulse'ed away. Smaller units are gibbed, larger units take no damage (and stop us if we're a vehicle).

hit_interval.description: How often an entity can be hit by this entity

activation_threshold_kmh.description: If the overlap zone's speed is below this threshold it applies no damage. -1 means don't enable/disable based on speed.

deactivation_threshold_kmh.description: If the overlap zone's speed is above or equaL to this threshold it applies no damage. Unused if zero.

on_vehicle_speed_forward.description: [bool]If tied to vehicles, zone will activate from forward movement

on_vehicle_speed_reverse.description: [bool]If tied to vehicles, zone will activate from reverse movement

corpse_unit_size_mod.description: When using the Unit overlap method, do we want to shift the corpse category up or down? (Mianly used for vehicles, making it easier to traverse through corpses)

track_node_velocity.description: [bool]True if we should track this zones velocity and based activation on this speed rather than the unit / vehicle speed.

ignore_allies.description: [bool]If true, no damage is dealt to allies.

only_damage_avatar_and_enemies.description: [bool]If true this zone only deals damage to avatars and enemies.

only_damage_corpses.description: [bool]If true this zone only deals damage to corpses.

only_hit_main_damage_zone.description: [bool]If true, we don't damage specific actors on overlapped targets
